channel.title: Google on This Programming Life
channel.description: Recent content in Google on This Programming Life

item.title: 3 years on Google App Engine. An Epic Review.
item.description: For the last 3 years I worked on an application that runs on Google App Engine. It is a fascinating, unique piece of service Google is offering here. Unlike anything you’ll find elsewhere. This is my in-depth, personal take on it. Google’s Cloud (est. 2008) First of all, what is Google App Engine (GAE) actually? It is a platform to run your web applications on. Like Heroku. But different when you look closer.
